amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Reissue Revised Statutes of Nebraska
amendatorysection.catchline: Use of singular and plural; gender.
amendatorysection.para: In the Uniform Commercial Code, unless the statutory context otherwise requires:
(1) words in the singular number include the plural, and those in the plural include the singular; and
(2) words of any gender also refer to any other gender.
